message.content:
cs.RO, cs.AI, cs.HC, cs.LG, cs.SD

Reasoning: 
- cs.RO (Robotics): The paper focuses on designing an intelligent tutoring robot and proposes a perception-planning-action model for the robot's interactions with students and the curriculum. 
- cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence): The paper discusses the application of AI techniques in the design of intelligent tutoring robots. 
- cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction): The paper provides insights on promoting human-robot teaching-learning process and AI-assisted educational techniques. 
- cs.LG (Machine Learning): The paper discusses the use of AI techniques in the design of intelligent tutoring robots, which may involve machine learning algorithms. 
- cs.SD (Software Engineering): The paper may also fall under this category as it discusses the design guidelines and future research perspectives in intelligent tutoring robots.
